EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: October 24, 2017 - El Barrio es Nuestro Community Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
SAVE THE DATE
WHAT: El Barrio es Nuestro – Community Meeting
WHEN: Tuesday, October 24, 2017
TIME: 5:30 PM – 7:00 PM
LOCATION: Somerset Villas – 200 E. Somerset Street, Philadelphia PA 19134
TRAINER: DBHIDS – OFFICE OF ADDICTION SERVICES
TO REGISTER: email Damaris.Feliciano@phila.gov or Luz.paradoa@phila.gov
